FuncDef:
The seamless-bfd enable command enables seamless bidirectional forwarding detection (SBFD) for an SRv6 TE Policy.
The seamless-bfd disable command disables SBFD for an SRv6 TE Policy.
By default, the srv6-te-policy seamless-bfd enable command configuration is directly inherited.

ParaDef.Info:
Enables SBFD for an SRv6 TE Policy.
-

Disables SBFD for an SRv6 TE Policy.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The srv6-te-policy seamless-bfd enable command enables SBFD for all SRv6 TE Policies in the Segment Routing Ipv6 view. However, the seamless-bfd command enables SBFD for a single SRv6 TE Policy.
If the srv6-te-policy seamless-bfd enable and seamless-bfd commands are both run for an SRv6 TE Policy, the latter command takes precedence.
